name: ChronoClock
description: Next in line to manage a multi-million dollar corporation is our protagonist, Rei Sawatari. He inherited one very important heirloom from his late grandfather: a single pocket watch that grants him a mysterious powerâ€” The power to go five minutes back in time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
